description.value:
You can identify alchemical items quickly. When using the Crafting skill to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Identify Alchemy] on an alchemical item you hold, you can do so as a single action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits, instead of spending 10 minutes.

If you have the formula for the item you are attempting to identify, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check, and if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

rules.label: Alchemical Savant (identify alchemical items with formula)

rules.text: If have the formula for the item you're identifying, and you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.
